mapper.select: SELECT meet_poster, meet_subject,meet_start,meet_end,meet_price,meet_total,meet_limit,meet_hit,meet_regdate,num FROM(SELECT meet_poster, meet_subject,meet_start,meet_end,meet_price,meet_total,meet_limit,meet_hit,meet_regdate,rownum as num FROM(SELECT meet_poster, meet_subject,meet_start,meet_end,meet_price,meet_total,meet_limit,meet_hit,meet_regdate FROM meeting WHERE om_id = #{om_hid} ORDER BY meet_no DESC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT meet_no,meet_poster, meet_subject,meet_start,meet_end,meet_price,meet_total,meet_limit,meet_hit,meet_regdate FROM meeting WHERE om_id = #{om_hid} ORDER BY meet_no DESC
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*)/5) FROM meeting WHERE om_id = #{om_hid}
